about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a Website Developer with 1 year of experience, holding a degree in Informatics Engineering from Universitas Teknologi Bandung, and a distinction graduate in Cloud Computing from Bangkit Academy 2023 Batch 2. Currently, I am working in Tokyo, Japan, as a company employee, where I am learning and adapting to the Japanese work environment while improving my Japanese communication skills. I am open to collaboration or job opportunities where I can apply everything I have learned so far or a new field to learn new things, as gaining diverse experiences excites me. My ultimate goal is to build and advance my career in the IT field in Japan.
